name: Hand Of Darkness
description:
HAND OF DARKNESS

Hand Of Darkness is a fast-paced shooting game that puts you in an endless dungeon to face endless legions of demons. Armed with the hand of darkness and a fluid movement system, fight to survive as long as you can.

Controls:
  • [ W ] [ S ] [A] [D] - Move player
  • [LMB] Shoot Style 1
  • [RMB] Shoot Style 2
  • [Z] Active RAGE MODE
Gameplay Features:
  • Harvest demonic crystals to increase the rage power.
  • Be one of the top 100 on the live leaderboard.
  • Darkness power, can be used as a shot attack or rapid fire.
  • Advanced movement techniques allow for speed boosts.
System Requirements:Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz dual core or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics card: -------
  • Storage: 200 MB of available space
